#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#define pb push_back
#define big long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vb vector<big>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	big l,t,n,i,j,k,temp,c,count;
	vb v;
	cin>>t;
	while(t-->0)
    {
        count=0;
        cin>>n>>k;
        FOR(i,0,n-1)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            if(temp>=k) count++;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    
	return 0;
}
